front.title: A clarification on the use of Globally Routable User Agent URIs (GRUUs) in the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Event Notification Framework

abstract.t: Experience since the publication of the most recent SIP Events framework has shown that there is room for interpretation around the use of Globally Routable User Agent URIs in that specification. This document clarifies the intended behavior. This document updates RFC 6665.
